'in aladhin jahaduu ma 'unzl 'iilayk min rabik astkbarana wtghyanana, ln yaqae minhum al'iyman, swa' akhwwafthm whdhrthm min eadhab allh, 'am tarakt dhlk; l'israrhm ealaa batlhm
